column4: hey i got a question? is Pidgin virus safe? are there any other alternatives? just like to use ym
hey i got a question? is Pidgin virus safe? are there any other alternatives? just like to use ym

at ease soldier, You arn't going to be getting any viruses, and empathy is built into the OS now which makes Yahoo messaging really easy... Click on your name on the top right and click chat accounts and setup your YM account through there
